tool_description: Simple api to finding best color palette for you, and your website
name: color-hunter
title: color-hunter

api_list.name: basic color
api_list.description:
**Basic Color**
Return default 50 palettes of colors based on query.
type: **popular** | **hot**
random: **true** | **false**
limit: **number**
color:  return palette which included this color - color need to be in hex without '#'
